author: Peter Goff
title: Coronavirus: WHO on defensive after outcry over Taiwan snub
description: Video adds to Taiwan’s grievances, including accusations health body ignored its early virus warnings
content:
The World Health Organisation went into damage control on Monday amid growing criticism of its isolation of Taiwan since the coronavirus outbreak, and accusations it ignored an early warning from Taipei about the possibility of human-to-human transmissions.
